p: Taking medications daily for the rest of their lives was a new concept for many of the participants. Furthermore, it was initially a significant challenge for many of the participants to remember to take the prescribed medications. Again, we can see in the extract below the importance of using a pillbox. The pillbox helped Participant 14 to develop a routine. These days, the medications have become a part of his life, and he does not need the pillbox as a reminder.
